attributes.action: Give all Students in the uk student ID cards
attributes.additional_details:
Many students face the challenge of being asked for ID and many of us do not have A valid ID 
Not all schools/colleges in the uk issue children who attend the school ID cards which is a negative.
attributes.background:
Give all Students in the uk Student ID cards which has a date of birth on the Card and a photo of the card user which can also be used as ID.
The card should have the name of the school you attend, a recent photo of you and your date of birth. I want the government to issue students in the uk ID

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551331.
